Personal Title: Computer Systems Engineer | Full-Stack Web developer | Freelance
About Me: Computer Systems Engineer and Full Stack Developer with 7 years of experience building robust and scalable applications. Front-End specialist with strong expertise in React, passionate about creating high-performance, smooth, and intuitive user interfaces. Seeking to leverage a solid foundation in component architecture and state management to transition into Mobile Development, utilizing cross-platform technologies to deliver impactful native experiences.
